===========================
gunshotmatch-method-writer
===========================

.. start short_desc

**Method writer for GunShotMatch.**

.. end short_desc

Installation
--------------

.. start installation

``gunshotmatch-method-writer`` can be installed from PyPI.

To install with ``pip``:

.. code-block:: bash

	$ python -m pip install gunshotmatch-method-writer

.. end installation
